sentence.text: The clinical presentation of both patients was initially thought to be suggestive of Lin-Gettig syndrome (glycosaminoglycan biosynthetic process), a multiple malformation syndrome associated with craniosynostosis that was initially reported in two brothers in 1990, with a third patient reported in 2003.
We show that craniosynostosis, which has not been previously reported in association with histone acetylation mutations, may be part of the genitopatellar/Say Barber Biesecker Young Simpson spectrum.
